settings.info_content:
Apply to our eyely Ambassador Program and receive exclusive FREE decor, every month. 

It'll be worth it, trust us.

If you are accepted, you'll be gifted and rewarded: 

1)  eyely product for FREE

2)  create content and get reposted on our Instagram to increase your engagement

This ambassador program isn't like anyone else,

We really want you to be part of our community, and gift you with our exclusive home decor.

settings.heading: Become an eyely ambassador and get exclusive home products for free
settings.description: Our program isn't like the other ones. With us, you'll get gifted, every single month your choice of our curated selection of home decor
